3 uav_flocking_coverage::uav_flocking_coverage ()
4 {
5  NodeHandle nh;
6  flock = new uav_flocking();
7  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/flock_vel", flock_vel, 0.5);
8  int queue_size;
9  nh.param(this_node::getName() + "/queue_size", queue_size, 1);
10 
11  geometry_msgs::Point wp;// = path->current_wp(); TODO
12  ROS_DEBUG("Initial waypoint: [%.2f, %.2f]", wp.x, wp.y);
13 
14  // publishers for visualization
15  pub_vis_wp = nh.advertise<geometry_msgs::PointStamped>("vis/wp", queue_size);
16 }

23 behavior_state_t uav_flocking_coverage::step ()
24 {
25  // update position information
26  spinOnce();
27 
28  // get current waypoints of path
29  geometry_msgs::Point wp;// = path->current_wp(); TODO
30 
31  // compute distance reached within next few cycles
32  int cycles = 10; // TODO: make param
33  double delta = 10;//cycles * flock_vel * rate->expectedCycleTime().toSec();
34 
35  // select next waypoint if close to current one
36  // TODO: should be enough if one of the swarm members reaches the point?! or swarm center?
37  geometry_msgs::Pose wp_pose;
38  wp_pose.position = wp;
39  if (pos.dist(wp_pose) < delta) {
40 // wp = path->next_wp();
41  ROS_DEBUG("Move to waypoint [%.2f, %.2f]", wp.x, wp.y);
42  }
43 
44  // visualize waypoint
45  geometry_msgs::PointStamped wp_st;
46  wp_st.point = wp;
47  wp_st.header.stamp = Time::now();
48  wp_st.header.frame_id = "local_origin_ned";
49  pub_vis_wp.publish(wp_st);
50 
51  // finished path
52  if (wp.x == 0.0 && wp.y == 0.0)
53  return STATE_ABORTED;
54 
55  // compute velocity to reach waypoint
56  geometry_msgs::Vector3 cover_velocity = vel.compute_velocity(wp, flock_vel);
57 
58  // compute velocity for flocking of CPSs
59  geometry_msgs::Vector3 velocity = flock->coverage(cover_velocity);
60 
61  // move with new velocity
62  vel.move(velocity);
63 
64  // return state to action server
65  return STATE_ACTIVE;
66 }
67 
68 void uav_flocking_coverage::stop ()
69 {
70  geometry_msgs::Vector3 velocity;
71  vel.move(velocity);
72 }
